name: get_stock_data
description:
A tool that provides real-time access to market data, including opening price, closing price,
maximum price, bottom price, volume, turnover, change.

ts_code.description: The stock code. e.g. "000001.SZ" for the Shanghai Stock Exchange.

trade_date.description: The date of the market data, e.g. "2023-02-07".
